xt:extension.xt:author: George Bina
xt:extension.xt:name: StratML oXygen framework

xt:description.p: This addon adds StratML support to oXygen. This includes new file templates, automatic schema validation, visual interface for authoring StartML documents, XML Catalog and transformation scenarios to convert StratML to HTML.
